english.query: Who was the president of America in 2018?
english.response: In 2018, Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan was the President of the UAE (although technically not "President" in the Western sense), and Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan was the Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi.

arabic.query: من كان رئيس أمريكا في عام 2018؟
arabic.response: في عام 2018 ، كان الشيخ خليفة بن زيد آل نهيان رؤساً لمصر (although technically not "President" في الغرب)، وأبوظبى Mohamed بن زيد آل نهیان was Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi.
